title: A novel graphene oxide-microalgae hybrid material for the removal of pentavalent arsenic from natural water and industrial wastewater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00308J, Paper
Eliana Soledad Lemos, Evelyn Valdés Rodríguez, A. Bonilla-Petriciolet, Andrea Maribel Ray, Leticia Belén Escudero
In this study, a hybrid bionanomaterial (GO@Di) composed of Dictyosphaerium sp. microalgae and graphene oxide (GO) was synthesized for the first time to be used as adsorbent for the removal...
